summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to report an issue with their bill. The customer had purchased a 55-inch HDTV for $499.99, but was charged $549.99 on their bill. The customer service agent asked for the customer's account number so they could investigate further and asked if the customer received any promotions or discounts when making the purchase. The customer service agent assured the customer that they would look into why they were charged more than the advertised price and get back to them shortly.
